desc: ３ターンの間、闇属性の味方ユニット全員の防御力を５０％アップ

dictionary.lore: A protection seal made from a Paladin Stone in which the spirit of dark obtained from a Dark Eye is sealed. It increases the defense power of dark users. Seals are generally made by Summoners, but recently they have been found appearing naturally, which is assumed from the fact that the beasts carrying them have no knowledge of synthesis.

name: 闇護石
